rnalysis.fastq.PairedEndPipeline.export_pipelineÔÉÅ

PairedEndPipeline.export_pipeline(filename: Optional[Union[str, Path]]) → Union[None, str]ÔÉÅ

Export a Pipeline to a Pipeline YAML file or YAML-like string.

Parameters:

filename (str, pathlib.Path, or None) ‚Äì filename to save the Pipeline YAML to, or None to return a YAML-like string instead.

Returns:

if filename is None, returns the Pipeline YAML-like string.
